Name: Watermelon Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of fresh watermelon wedge on rim or watermelon slices sweets/candy .
Review: Watermelon fruit shines in this medium-dry riff on a Vodka Martini .
History: Created in May 2020 by yours truly.
Nutrition: One serving of Watermelon Martini contains 195 calories
